name: Cranium Conundrum
description: Cranium Conundrum is a physics-based puzzle platformer taking place in the dream worlds that you create!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, Windows 7, or Windows 8 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
